title: Alleviation of drought stress damages by melatonin and Bacillus thuringiensis associated with adjusting photosynthetic efficiency, antioxidative system, and anatomical structure of Glycine max (L.)
content:
Publication date: 30 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 14

Author(s): Wasimah B. Al-Shammari, Arwa Abdulkreem AL-Huquil, Kholoud Alshammery, Salwa Lotfi, Haya Altamimi, Abeer Alshammari, Nadi Awad Al-Harbi, Afaf Abdullah Rashed, Khaled Abdelaal
